level.text: This chapter establishes the fees and charges for filings, certifications, and reports submitted to or requested of the Corporations Division of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs.
For each of the filings required by the Corporations Division, the Director shall offer the following optional services:
Expedited same-day service: one hundred dollars ($100), in addition to all other fees required by statute or regulation; and
Expedited three (3)-day service: fifty dollars ($50), in addition to all other fees required by statute or regulation.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Act of 2010, effective September 24, 2010 (D.C. Law 18-223), published at 57 DCR 6242, 6273 (July 23, 2010); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 8165, 8166 (July 6, 2012).
